text:
Getaround (http://Getaround.com), San Francisco, CA, Onsite

We're looking to expand our web team, so we're looking for several good full-stack engineers!

The web portion of our product is largely Python/JS stack sitting on top of GAE. Looking for experienced engineers right now.

Apply at: https://www.getaround.com/jobs#ecc909fb-3383-406c-ad54-fa3a6...
